ygData.msgSnippet: In most experiments, the individual ANNs in NEAT do not learn. Instead, learning happens over the course of generations through evolution.  In other words,

In most experiments, the individual ANNs in NEAT do not learn.  
Instead, l=
earning happens over the course of generations through 
evolution.  In othe=
r words, improvements happen from one ANN through 
its descendents.  

On t=
he other hand, there are experiments with "adaptive synapses" 
where the we=
ights of connection can change over the course of a 
network's lifetime thr=
ough local learning rules, for example in our 
paper here:

http://nn.cs.ut=
exas.edu/keyword?stanley:cec03

ken
